kickstart.post:
VERSION=`/opt/stack/bin/stack report version` ARCH=`uname -i`
mkdir -p /export/stack/contrib/default/$VERSION/$ARCH/RPMS chmod 775 /export/stack/contrib/default/$VERSION/$ARCH/RPMS chown root:apache /export/stack/contrib/default/$VERSION/$ARCH/RPMS
mkdir -p /export/stack/site-profiles/default/$VERSION/graphs/default chmod 775 /export/stack/site-profiles/default/$VERSION/graphs/default chown root:apache /export/stack/site-profiles/default/$VERSION/graphs/default
mkdir -p /export/stack/carts chown root:apache /export/stack/carts
